description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7un6r","text":"Lentivirus Production, Lentivirus Transduction, and Sorting Protocol for making the transduced iPSCs and SH-SY5Ys","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"b737","text":"Materials and Reagents (Transfection and transduction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4fbd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20pm7","text":"0.25% Trypsin-EDTA [Gibco, #25300-054]","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"almub","text":"500 ml PBS [Gibco, #14190-144] ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"108u7","text":"Lipofectamine 3000 Transfection reagent (Cat. L3000001) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5k03","text":"Polybrene (Cat. TR-1003-G) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lies","text":"Puromycin ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv5j4","text":"Transfer Plasmid (A2, Mart1, or LRRK2+) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmejc","text":"Packaging Plasmid (ex. psPAX2) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hip","text":"Envelope Plasmid ( ex. VSV.G) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48ehe","text":"45 µm cell strainer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kv4a","text":"Reagents (Sorting)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hi7s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beo9c","text":"1.\tDPBS no calcium not magnesium Cat.14190144 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38fvm","text":"2.\tTrypsin-EDTA (0.25%) Cat. 25200056 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do7oe","text":"3.\tKnockout SR (Serum Replacement for ESCs/iPSCs) Cat.10828010 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh9gl","text":"4.\tSterile Corning Falcon Cell Strainer 70µm ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gm03","text":"5.\tFalcon 5mL Round Polystyrene sorting tube with strainer snap cap Cat. 352235","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ckv2p","text":"Seed HEK293FT cells into 6-well dishes, 1.1e6, 2 ml/well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nmuc","text":": 80% confluence after 20 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p8oi","text":"After 20 h, transfect HEK293FT cells using Lipo3000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crtam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p9ei","text":"a.    Tube A: Dilute 7 ul Lipo3000 in 250 ul OPTI-MEM/well, vortex 3s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75jfq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7ta4","text":"b.    Tube B: Dilute below in 250 ul OPTI-MEM/well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kkum","text":"1 ug Packaging plasmid psPAX2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63aft","text":"1.5 ug Envelope plasmid VSV.G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q64t","text":"2 ug Transfer plasmid (ex. pLVX-EF1alpha-IRES-mCherry-HLA-A2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eraeb","text":"Then add 6 ul P3000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65c3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hvlh","text":"c.     
Mix Tube A + B. Incubate 10 minutes at room temperature.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0g91","text":"d.    
Remove 1 ml of media from each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6odbv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"172nn","text":"e.    
Add #c to cells and slowly add Tube A+B mixture. Incubate 6 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu3bb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vbd7","text":"f.      
After 6 hours, remove and replace the medium, 1.5 ml/well. Incubate 18 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6r59k","text":"(24 h post-transfection) Harvest entire volume of cell supernatant, store @4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1rps","text":"(Slowly) Replace with 1.5 ml pre-warmed HEK293FT media/well. Incubate 28 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agbpk","text":"(52 h post-transfection) Harvest entire volume of cell supernatant and combine with #1 (total 3 ml/well collected).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fa94d","text":"Fibroblast","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8aqef","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3tl7","text":"1. Seed fibroblast 2e5 cells in a 6-well plate or 24-well plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tnef","text":"2. Next day, Infect the fibroblast with 8 µg/ml Polybrene media, 48 hrs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elvo6","text":"!!! Titer to set the ratio of lentivirus to media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs2ru","text":"A)\t0.5 ml Lentivirus + 1.5 ml media (6 well plate) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqn99","text":"B)\t50ul Lentivirus + 250ul cell media (24 well plate) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kq1t","text":"3. Change media with cell media, 48 hrs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdiqt","text":"4. Select transduced cells with 2 ug/ml Puromycin media or Flow cytometry for tagged cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9upv","text":"5. Change media with fresh 2 ug/ml Puromycin media, 24 h. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfbkj","text":"6. Subculture cells to 60mm dish and expand ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ojou","text":"7. Freeze and store the cells in LN2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rsta","text":"iPSCs ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6or8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kh2n","text":"1. Seed iPSCs 3.0e5 cells/well in a 6-well plate-Vitronectin(0.5ug/ml). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lclq","text":"2. Next day, replace medium in wells with fresh media and place back into the incubator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pbks","text":"3. Infect the iPSCs, 16 h with 8µg/mL of Polybrene ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7kp1","text":"!!! Titer to set the ratio of lentivirus to the media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5639c","text":"A)\t0.5 ml Lentivirus + 1.5 ml iPSC media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffpv9","text":"B)\t1 ml Lentivirus + 1 ml iPSC media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nkee","text":"4. Change media with iPSC media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egvek","text":"5. Next day, select transduced cells with antibiotics (2 ug/ml Puromycin media, 48 h) or flow cytometry for tagged cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4makr","text":"A)\tFlow core: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEXgZn6EKFfuUuVGj-JruBkCRCNHt6XynndK8rXHNtXPKErA/viewform ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":99}],"data":{}},{"key":"1okoe","text":"6. Collect about 2 to 3e5 cells and plate them in 2(35mm dishes) with RVC ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"716db","text":"7. Change media next day without RVC ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rnvb","text":"8. Expand and freeze the cells for storage in LN2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FE8B6A5D3C4711EE882A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEXgZn6EKFfuUuVGj-JruBkCRCNHt6XynndK8rXHNtXPKErA/viewform"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tb8p","text":"1. Aspirate the medium, wash with 2mL DPBS twice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m2c4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lco9","text":"2. Add mL Trypsin or 0.5mM EDTA to the dishes and incubate to lift the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a982k","text":"
            A. for iPSCs lift the cells as single cells
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av8sr","text":"3. Add 2ml complete medium to stop trypsinization, and pipette up and down to collect all cells
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bipac","text":"3. Transfer all cell suspension into a 15ml conical tube, spin down to get the cell pellet 200g for 4min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78hur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3niif","text":"4. Resuspend each cell pellet in 1ml sorting medium (Add 2% (vol/vol) KnockOut serum replacement to 50 ml of DPBS. Can be stored at 4 °C for 6 weeks.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5987k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4a3l","text":"            To make 50 mL add 1mL of KnockOut serum into 49mL DPBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1slrr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21v2r","text":"5. Prime the cell strainer with 2mL of sorting medium making sure to cover the entire mesh. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cihsj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j6j7","text":"6. Discard the sorting medium in the 50mL tube
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6dn1","text":"7. Apply each cell suspension to the center of a cell strainer (pushing through with pipette where necessary, and – with a new tip – pulling off strained cell suspension stuck to the bottom of filter).
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m7s7","text":"8. After straining the cell suspension, add about 50µL of sorting medium to wash the strainer for any left-over cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q5km","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"601nm","text":"9. Aliquot cell suspension into sorting tubes and put it on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb62t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au362","text":"10. Add DAPI (diluted 1:10,000 to make final concentration at 0.1ug/ml) to the strained cell suspension. This helps to distinguish live from dead cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pmjc","text":"
            0.1µL per 1mL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81ijh","text":"To prep for FACS: for each condition,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iv2s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vbud","text":"•Take 2 culture tubes with 1 mL of growth medium to catch the sorted cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap9ga","text":"\n•Take 3ml extra sorting medium (in case they ask us to dilute the sample) put everything on ice to take to the FACS facility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rvbj","text":"Sorting Parameters: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k7ot","text":"1.        Go to the FACS facility at 149, 5th floor, and ring the bell to be let in. Sorting parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":43,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etd6s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18r7b","text":"(i)      Use nozzle 1 (100um)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p9no","text":"(ii)     mCherry detection (blue channel; ex: 587nm; em: 610)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mcbo","text":"(iii)   Just collect mCherry-positive cells; give them the sushi medium-containing tubes to collect cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b760b","text":"(iv)   Tell them you want to try to get \u003e200,000 cells per condition where possible but prioritize getting through as many samples as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85fc9","text":"(v)    Can keep cold while sorting, or sort at RT (either is fine).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4foum","text":"(vi)   Can let them know how inclusive/restrictive to be when making gates. Threshold parameters include:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blr8k","text":"-      sorting for singlets (cells on diagonal); doublets usually indicate 2 cells stuck together","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":8}],"data":{}},{"key":"ecrr2","text":"-      getting rid of particles that are likely debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev2u9","text":"-      selecting the mCherry intensity threshold","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B52AAACF3C4811EE882A0A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}
